Subskills.name: Burstshot
Subskills.description: Chance on attack for arrow turret to fire twice.

Subskills.name: Deadshot
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical damage.

Subskills.name: Colossalshot
Subskills.description: Arrow turret projectile is changed into a giant piercing arrow that deals increased damage based on the projectile amount scaling.

Subskills.name: Arrow Turrets
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of arrow turrets.

Subskills.name: Stuttershot
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to knock monsters back dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Freezing Shot
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict freeze on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Multishot
Subskills.description: Turrets fire additional projectiles in an arc.

Subskills.name: High Velocity
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of arrow turret.

Subskills.name: This is My Design
Subskills.description: Now spawn a single arrow turret that fires towards all nearby monsters. Arrow turret now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Explosive Technician
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Exploding Arrowhead
Subskills.description: Projectiles now stick an explosive to the target on hit that explodes dealing additional damage after a short delay.

Subskills.name: Hypothermic Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to freezing targets.

Subskills.name: Cyclone Turret
Subskills.description: Arrow turret now moves forward spinning rapidly firing projectiles in all directions for a much shorter duration and eventually explodes dealing damage on a large radius.

Subskills.name: Piercing Arrowheads
Subskills.description: Arrow turret now fires piercing projectiles knocking back monsters dealing increased damage.
